title: Image
description: This schema is used to set images for seller skus

image_type.description:
#DESCRIPTION 

			Whether it is the "Main Image" , "Alternate Image" or  a  "Swatch Image" for the given Merchant SKU. 

			#Valid values

			*'Main Image' - the primary image used for the give MerchantSKU 

			*'Alternate Image' - supporting images for the given MerchantSKU 

			*'Swatch' - an example of a color or fabric of the given MerchantSKU

image_url.description: URL location where Jet.com can access the image
